pull.title: release: bump required osx version to 10.8. (jonasschnelli)
pull.body:
libc++ on 10.7 causes too many issues.

See #8577 for discussion/details. Needs backport to 0.13.

No change on my 10.11 machine.

Looks like this on 10.7:
![10 7disabled](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/417043/19699057/bc553292-9abf-11e6-89f1-2dbfd966b376.png)

And when trying to run it:
![10 7disabled2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/417043/19699062/c2f9d35a-9abf-11e6-975b-6ad7ec1b5519.png)

utACK 339c4b6c3a8e68e4bba1969d144e413a462b68f1
Started a only-OSX gitian build: https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/pulls/9015/ (will give it a test on my VMs soon).

utACK 339c4b6c3a8e68e4bba1969d144e413a462b68f1 

 is this really for 0.13.1 or just 0.13.2?
I think 0.14 with backport to 0.13.2 is fine. No need to do another rc round.

@MarcoFalke 0.13.1, it "solves" the only remaining issue for the 0.13.1 milestone.
Still needs doc updates, I just wanted to get the approach ACKed/verified asap.
Fine with me, as this only changes the error message from to So it is "Docs and Output" and requires no rc4.
